name: Fixed Income Leaders Summit Hong Kong, 27 June 2018
content: Want to gain an insight into how leading buy side fixed income heads are responding to new regulatory reforms, the opening of China's bond market and continued market fragmentation? Now you can by benchmarking your people, processes and technology with 100+ buy side heads of fixed income at the Fixed Income Leaders Summit Hong Kong. The perfect learning and networking opportunity to unlock the full potential of your fixed income division. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/231922-2?pid=4868 Prices: Main Conference Only: USD 2999.0 Main Conference And Focus day: USD 3199.0 Main Conference And Awards: USD 3399.0 Main Conference, Focus Day And Awards: USD 3599.0 SOLUTION PROVIDERS - Main Conference Only: USD 3699.0 Time: 8:00 am to 6:00 pm Venue Details: Harbour Grand, Hong Kong, 23 Oil St, North Point, Hong Kong
